ext_descriptions.ext_description:
The alias_assignment_is_valid function evaluates whether an instance of applied_identification_assignment whose identification role is 'alias', contains, in its items attribute, only instances of types listed in aliasable_item.
The function returns TRUE is the role is not 'alias' or if the items attribute only contains instances of types listed in aliasable_item.
the instance of applied_identification_assignment, the validity of which is assessed.

The aliases_are_valid rule ensures that all instances of applied_identification_assignment whose identification role is 'alias', contain, in their items attribute, only instances of types listed in aliasable_item.
there shall not be any instance of applied_identification_assignment that provides an alias to an instance of an entity not listed in aliasable_item.
